title: 12: OBITCH here lies Ben Dover and Mike Hunt
description:
Oh bitch...this week we're learning all about Walking Corpse Syndrome, aka Cotard's syndrome, coffin clubs, we've got an old obituary, an ostitchuary, and so much more. 
Rate & Review!
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors:
Apostrophe: Apostrophe.com/obit code ‘obit’ to save $15 
Magic Spoon: magicspoon.com/obit code ‘obit’ to save $5

https://montrealgazette.remembering.ca/obituary/moe-lester-1082993857
https://www.taborfuneralhome.com/obituary/Anita-Krueger
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/florida-couple-trapped-closet-john-arwood-amber-campbell_n_6406464

https://www.webmd.com/schizophrenia/cotards-syndrome
